bug.author: treo
bug.summary: Catch cases in MultiLabelLoss where label array is all 0/1
bug.description: The loss function requires that the label array defines two sets: The in set (1) and the out set (0). If it is all 0 or all 1, then it runs into NaNs.

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
